nodes.text: DLC-13 was a DLC-13 mining droid with masculine programming who once helped the B1-series battle droid R0-GR save his friend Rowan Freemaker from certain doom. After the incident, DLC-13 stayed in contact with Roger, and even sent him cards on Life Day.

DLC-13 first appeared in the LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures Season One episode "The Mines of Graballa", but was later canonized in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Droidography. In the episode, DLC-13 worked at an ore mine in the Belgaroth asteroid field following the Battle of Hoth. DLC-13 was carrying out his duties in the processing plant when Rowan Freemaker, who was in trance-like state, was carried in the droid's pot. Rowan's minder the B1 battle droid Roger implored Rowan to snap out of the trance. Later, Rowan was separated and traveled on the conveyer belt. In the meantime, Roger managed to befriend the droid and convince him to save Rowan from falling into a vat of hot molten liquid. Before partying company, Roger told DLC-13 he was welcome to visit him at the Wheel space station.
